versiculos.texto: 'Iki Yawé niukieya kanihikitini, Tsupuniyaxi kemitiutahiawarie Kutsi nu'aya, mikita Kerariyaxi nu'aya, mikita 'Amariyaxi nu'aya, mikita 'Etsekiyaxi nu'aya, kepauka miti'aitakai Kutsiyaxi 'Amuni nu'aya, Kura kwieyaritsie: [cite: 5343, 5347, 5348, 5349, 5350, 5351]
«Meteyunaime nepitiwareuyehiani kemeteyupaimeti kwiepa memitexuawe [cite: 5355, 5356] -Yawé mipai kanaineni-. [cite: 5357]

Teiteri meta tewaxi nekaniwareuyehiamiki, [cite: 5358] meta memite'awiwawe meta haramaratsie memiteye'uwa, [cite: 5359, 5360] metatsiere kakaiyarixi memiwewiyatika metatsiere teiteri 'axamemite'u'iyari yaxeikia. [cite: 5361, 5362, 5363] >>Teiteri nekaniwarakumaweriyamiki 'ena kwiepa naitsarie [cite: 5364, 5365] -mipai kanaineni Yawé-. [cite: 5366]

>>Kura kwieyaritsie kiekatari nepitiwakwinitiani, meta yunaime Kerutsareme kiekatari. Wahari huyerieya 'iarime naime nepakuyeitiani, meta mawari wewiwamete hetsiana miemete kememitetetewa naime, meta kemi'ane yukii heima memukatunuma'uwe, [cite: 5367, 5368]

muyuawitsie miemete xurawetsixi mewarayexeiyati, meta kemi'ane metitunuma'uti, [cite: 5373, 5374, 5375, 5376, 5377] kename Yawé me'ayexeiya memutiyuane, [cite: 5378] Muruki yaxeikia kwitiwata kakaiyari memitehahiawe, [cite: 5379, 5380, 5381, 5382]
meta kemi'ane Yawé memuku'e'eiriwa, [cite: 5383] meta memikahe'iwawiya. [cite: 5385]
Kayuwati xekeneumaka Yawé Naimekimiyiwe hixie, [cite: 5387] Yawé mitixekwinitianitsie pehurari, [cite: 5389] Yawé mawari kaniukuha'aritiani meta yu'inierima kaniwaru'itieniri. [cite: 5390, 5391]

'Iya tukaritsie Yawé yumiireme muwakwinitsie nepitiwakwinitiani ti'aitame parewiwametemama meta niwemama, [cite: 5392, 5393, 5394] meta kemi'ane kamixate hipame kwieyaritsie miemete memanakatitika. [cite: 5395, 5396]

'Iya tukaritsie nekatiniwakwinitiamiki kemi'ane hipame memiwarayexeiya, [cite: 5397, 5398, 5399, 5400] kakaiyarixi meta memitehiniya yukakaiyarixi watukita piinite, [cite: 5401, 5402, 5403] 'itarikaki memite'a'iwaxi meta hipame mewananaimati. [cite: 5404]

>> Yawé mipai kanaineni: 'Iya tukaritsie parewiya hiwariyari pi'enierieni, [cite: 5405] kitenie Tsapa mititewatsie paiti, [cite: 5406] 'aiwari pi'enierieni Kiekari Hutarieka Mieme makumatsie, [cite: 5407, 5408] meta waikawa hiwari pa'eniiriikini yemuritetsie paiti. [cite: 5409]

>>>Xemeta xekeneutitsuanani, tetuayamete memakutei xemitama. [cite: 5414, 5415] Naiti tita xemitetua katineuyehiiyamiki, [cite: 5416] xepeuyehiiyani yunaiti kemi'ane pirata xemexeiyaniki xemiyia. [cite: 5417, 5418]

'Iya tukaritsie Kerutsareme nepayekexiya kixeme ne'akweti, [cite: 5419, 5420] nemitiwakwinitianiki kemi'ane yu'iyariki memi'uxipie, [cite: 5421, 5422] kaxie winuyari mikakuyuitiariwa meuyewexime hepai memi'ane, [cite: 5423, 5424] mipai memutiyuane: [cite: 5425] kemi'ane "Yawé [cite: 5426, 5434] 'atsipikatiyurieni, [cite: 5427] ni'axa [cite: 5435] pikatatsiyurieni [cite: 5429, 5430] pikatatsiyurieni". [cite: 5430]

Xepiinitiarika memixeka'una wa'iwarika pirayani, [cite: 5432, 5433, 5436, 5437] xekii yuxaita puyuhayewaxiani: [cite: 5438] "Yukii xepitiwewieni, [cite: 5439] peru muwa xepika'ayeyaxe, [cite: 5440] kaxie xepika'iteita, [cite: 5441] peru winuyari xepikaha'iniata”. [cite: 5442]

>> Yawé haxiaya tukariyari paye'axime, [cite: 5444] kanaye'aximeni yapauka. [cite: 5444] Yawé tukarieyatsie pienierieni kwinimieme memite'uka'eniwa hiwariyari, [cite: 5445] meta kemi'ane mikama 'ana kanitatsuamiki. [cite: 5445]
'Iya tukaritsie haxia tukariyari kanayeimiki, meta 'uximatiarika meta hiwerika tukariyari, [cite: 5445] xemika'unarieni meta xemakumaweriyarieni tukariyari, yiriya tukariyari, [cite: 5446]
meta haiwitiri miyiyixawi tukariyari, [cite: 5450] kuxineta meta kuyaxa hiwariyari tukariyari [cite: 5451, 5452] kiekarite kuraruyari 'amatititi hepaitsita mieme, [cite: 5453]

meta tuxiyu 'amutiti hepaitsita mieme. [cite: 5455] Ne nepiwaranukuweiya nekawa'uxipitiati, [cite: 5457, 5458] teiteri memikaheuneniereni hepai [cite: 5459] mepu'uwani, [cite: 5460] teiteri me'aneneti Yawé hepaitsita 'axamemite'uyuriki. [cite: 5461, 5462, 5463] Waxuriya nitayeuriyamiki tumuanari hepai, [cite: 5464] meta wakwinurite kwitarai hepai pitiyuxexeiyani. [cite: 5465, 5466]

Wahuru meta wapirata pikawatawikweitsitiani, [cite: 5467, 5468] Yawé haxiaya tukariyaritsie. [cite: 5469] 'Itetsarikaya taiyari naime kwie pakuxitsitiani, [cite: 5470, 5471] yapauka kaniwarakumaweriyamiki yunaime teiteri kwiepa memitama». [cite: 5472, 5473]
Xekeneyuyetua, tixaiti xekenayuyeitia, xekatehimetiti teiteri xemikayukatetewiya, [cite: 5476, 5477, 5478, 5479, 5480]

yaxeketenekakini mexi kahaye'awe kenemutayi, [cite: 5481] mexi tukari xemitehayewaki xemikwewiyatsie [cite: 5483, 5484, 5485] xatsi yapauka kemire'enitsitiariwa hepai kayiwe, [cite: 5486, 5487] mexi xehetsie kakawewe Yawé haxiaya mita'a, [cite: 5488] mexi xehetsie ka'aye'awe Yawé haxiaya tukariyari. [cite: 5489]

Yawé xekeneutiwawa, yunaiti xeme tixaiti tita mitiheitserie meta 'axekeneu'uwani tixaiti xekatehayuyeitiati, [cite: 5498, 5499, 5500] xekeneyutihawa xemikatehayuyeitia 'ena kwiepa, [cite: 5493] yaxemiteyurie 'aitsikateya kemaine. [cite: 5494] Xekeneutiwawa heiwati 'ana xe'uti'awieta, [cite: 5495, 5496] kepauka Yawé haxiaya tukarieya maye'anitsie. [cite: 5497, 5501, 5502]

Kahatsa kiekariyari yuxaitame kaniyuhayewamiki, [cite: 5505, 5506, 5507] meta yaxeikia 'Atsikaruni kiekariyari 'uniti kaniyuhayewamiki. [cite: 5508, 5509] 'Atsiruri kiekatari mekanayeweiyariekuni hekita, [cite: 5510] yaxeikiata 'Ekuruni kiekatari mekanitaweiyariekuni. [cite: 5511, 5512]

Xia'ui kereteutsixi teiteriyari haramara tetsita memitama. [cite: 5513, 5514] Yawé niukieya xehepaitsita kemitixekwinitiani, [cite: 5516, 5517, 5518] yakanaineni piritsiteutsixi Kanani kwieyaritsie xemitama: [cite: 5519, 5520] <<<Ne nekanixekwimiki nixeimetima mana nepikahayewa». [cite: 5521, 5522]
Haramara tetsita 'uweriti 'utsiiraiyeti kanayeimiki, [cite: 5524, 5525, 5526] miratihiriwa meta muxatsi wakuraru makumane. [cite: 5527, 5528]

Mana muxatsi mekatenitikwaikuni Kura nuiwarimama memiyuhayewa watewama. [cite: 5529, 5530] Taikai meputi'uxipiweni 'Atsikaruni kiekariyari muku'eiriwaxitsie, [cite: 5531, 5532] Yawé wakakaiyari waparewienike mana kaninuamiki 'aixia wayurienike. [cite: 5536, 5537, 5538]

<<Ke'axamemutiyuane muhawitsixi meta 'amunitsixi wayuriyarika, [cite: 5543, 5547, 5548] neteiterima wahepaitsita kememiteheuniuka meta wakwie mewanawairietiweti. [cite: 5549, 5550] Yawé mipai nekanaineni, [cite: 5551, 5552] -Mipai kanaineni Yawé Naimekimitirikaiye, [cite: 5552] 'Ixaheri Kakaiyarieya-, [cite: 5553] Muhawi Tsuruma kanayeimiki, [cite: 5554, 5555, 5556] kwieyari hepai 'aneti meta 'amunitsixi Kumuxa kiekariyari hepai mepi'itiarieni: [cite: 5557, 5558] witsaxa 'itsiyari xeikia payani meta 'una maxu- awe, [cite: 5559, 5560, 5561] Neteiterima memiyuhayewa wapiini mepitewanawairieni, [cite: 5562, 5563, 5564, 5565] meta neteiterima 'akuxi memu'uwani wakwie yupiini mepayeitiani». [cite: 5566, 5567]
'Ikiki mekatenakapitiariekuni memuyuta'irixiki, [cite: 5569, 5570, 5571] memiwarutaniukimaki meta memiwaxani'eriekaiki Yawé Naimekimitirikaiye teiterimama. [cite: 5572, 5573, 5574, 5575, 5576]

Mepitimamani kepauka Yawé yunaime kakaiyarixi kwiepa memitama muwaka'una, [cite: 5577, 5578, 5579] 'ana nuiwarite teewanarixititi, [cite: 5580] mekanikatunuma'uikuni nenewieri me'ipitianike, [cite: 5583] yuxexuiti yukwieyaritsie paiti. [cite: 5584]
<<Yaxeikiata xeme, 'etiupetsixi, [cite: 5586] ne'ixiparaki xekanikwi'iwakuni». [cite: 5587]

Yawé yutirikariya kanitani'amiki tayeta memukuma wahepa. [cite: 5590, 5591] 'Atsiriya kiekatari yunaime kaniwarakukwimiki, [cite: 5592] meta Niniwe 'akumaweme kanayeitiamiki, xiekaripa makuwaki hepai. [cite: 5593]

Kiekari muyuta'ire maku'ixaya payani muxatsi memite'atikwa'ani meta hipati tewaxi. [cite: 5594, 5595] Mana yukie mepayeitiani meteyunaiti yeutari. Nipe hamatia mikiri tuxiyu mu'u'uni hetsie mepakayaxikeni. [cite: 5596] Watsuari kii hixiapa nenieremetsie mepayetsuatikani, [cite: 5597] kitenie miranutahakitiretsie piranu'u'unini, kariuxa kiyeyari kii hetsie manuyehe hayekia puyehini. [cite: 5598]

'Iki kiekari muyutemawiekai kanihikitini, yu'iyariki 'aixia 'iyari 'amukumakai, [cite: 5599] yukimana mipai mutainekai: [cite: 5600] <<Ne xeikia nepihiki, xewiti tawari pumawe». [cite: 5601] Matsi neuxei puka'unarie meta yeutari wakie patia. [cite: 5602] Kehate mana memuyekine me'ixeiyame mepuyukatemamawieni me'inanaimati. [cite: 5603, 5604]
Xia'ui kiekari hipame pemiwananaima, [cite: 5611] pemikaheu'ena pemirexeiya. [cite: 5612, 5613]

Mikayu'ixatsitiarinia, meta tita 'axamiti'ane meta mikatiyuxatiarinia. [cite: 5614, 5615, 5616] Yawé hetsie yuri mikati'erie, [cite: 5617] meta yukakaiyari hetsia 'ahurawa mika'uyeika. [cite: 5618, 5619]

'Itsikate mana memanuka'u mayetsi memitehaketikika wahepai mepi'anene, [cite: 5620, 5621, 5622, 5623] wakuwexinaruritsixi 'irawetsixi yiwikita memuku'uwa mekanihikitini tita memitetakwani tixaiti mepikatekuhayeikawa memikakayeikieniki. [cite: 5624, 5625, 5626, 5627, 5628, 5629, 5630]

Kakaiyari niukametemama mana kiekatari mepite'itawa, [cite: 5631, 5632] Kakaiyari mepuku'eiri. [cite: 5633] Mawari wewiwamete piinite netukita timieme [cite: 5634] 5 Matsi Yawé mana muka kemitiheitserie katipatsiekame mepite'ayeitia, [cite: 5635, 5636, 5637] meta 'aitsika kemaine yamepikatekahu. [cite: 5638] Xexuime tukari mukatataretsie kemitiheitserie yapitiyuriene, [cite: 5641, 5642] meta pikatihayewa tukari miyehane mukatataretsie, [cite: 5643, 5644] peru 'axatiyuruwame tewiyarika pikamate. [cite: 5645]

<<Nekaniwaruka'una nuiwarite, [cite: 5646] kanakumawere wakuraru meta watuxiyu. [cite: 5650] Nekanihayewa kaye 'utia teiteri 'umaweme, nixewiti tima miki 'utia pika'uyeika. [cite: 5651] Kaniuyuhayewa wakiekarite 'u'uniti, [cite: 5652] nixewiti pikayuhayewaxi mana mukaniki. [cite: 5653]

Kiekari mipai nepitiutahiawixi: [cite: 5654] "Yuriki pepinetsi'ayemakaxeni, [cite: 5655] kenemimetita'ixatsitiani pepeu'enani". [cite: 5656] Hiki 'ayumieme wakiekari pikaka'unarienikekai, naimeki nemitita'aitiakaiki. [cite: 5657] Peru miyatiti, meyumexiitiati mekanakine pita 'axamemiteyurieniki naime hepaitsita. [cite: 5658, 5659]

'Ayumieme xekenenetakwewieka, [cite: 5660] yapauka nepirayu'iwa [cite: 5661] -Yawé mipai kanaineni-, [cite: 5662] 'ari nuiwarite neniwakuxeirimiki, [cite: 5663] meta te'aitamete nemitiwakwinitianiki nehaxiaki, [cite: 5664] Ne'itetsarika taiyariyariki, [cite: 5665] meta naimeki kenemireuha'a. [cite: 5667] naiti kwie kanakuxitsitiariemiki. [cite: 5668] >>>Teiteri 'aixia me'utiyuaneme nekaniwarayeitiamiki, [cite: 5669, 5670, 5671] para yunaiti meminetsihahiaweniki Yawé meminetsi'ayexeiyaniki kemititewa meta meteyukihiaweti. [cite: 5672, 5673, 5674, 5676] yaxeikia [cite: 5677]
Kutsi hatiayari manuyehapane 'anutaiye me'anexiame, [cite: 5678, 5679] 'imikieri mekaneni'atiiriekuni meminetsi'ayexeiya, neteiterima memeu- taxiriexia. [cite: 5680, 5681, 5682]

Miki tukaritsie tewiyarika xepikapitiarieniri, [cite: 5683, 5684] 'ari 'axaxeteyurieti xepitehayewa. [cite: 5688, 5689] Nekaniwarayeweiyamiki xetsata nehepaitsita [cite: 5690, 5691] miki teiteri mamariwemete memayuyeitiwa, [cite: 5692] hiki 'ana mepukumawere memiyuti'ire nehiri makupatsietsie. [cite: 5693, 5694]
Mekaniyuhayewakuni xeikia, [cite: 5695] tixaiti memikatehiki. [cite: 5696] Miki Yawé hetsie memitewiya memihikiki, [cite: 5697]

'etsimeyupaimeti memiyuhayewaxi 'ixaheritsixi, [cite: 5698, 5699] tita 'axamiti'ane mepikateyuriekari, [cite: 5700] 'itarikaki mepikatekuxatani, [cite: 5701] kwamanarikaki mepikatekuxatani. [cite: 5702] Mekateniutikwa'akuni [cite: 5703] meta meka- niuka'uxipiwekuni [cite: 5705] nixewiti kawamariutakaku». [cite: 5706]

Keneutahiwani, neniwe 'uka Tsiyuni, temawierikaki, [cite: 5708, 5709] memitehayu'iwa wahepai xeketeneuhiwani, [cite: 5710] Xekeneutikwikani meta xekeneyutemamawieka [cite: 5711] 'ixaheritsixi. [cite: 5712] yu'iyariki, [cite: 5713] neniwe 'uka Kerutsareme. [cite: 5714]
Yawé pikatixekwinitianiri, [cite: 5715] kaniwarutaweiya memimetsi'aye'unie. [cite: 5716] Yawé, 'Ixaheritsie ti'aitame, xetsata kaniukani: [cite: 5717] hatsuakuri pepikaheumaka. [cite: 5718]
Miki tukaritsie Kerutsareme mipai pititahiawarieni: [cite: 5720, 5721] <<Tsiyuni, pepikamaka meta pepika'utaweranareni, [cite: 5723, 5724, 5726]

Yawé 'akakaiyari 'ahamatia kaniukani [cite: 5727] miki kuya mirayu'iwa pihiki. [cite: 5731] Piyutemawieka 'ahetsiemieme, [cite: 5732] pimetsihekwariyani yunaki'eriyaki, [cite: 5733] kaniutakwikamiki yutemawieti 'ahetsiemieme [cite: 5733] 'ixiarari mihikitini hepai». [cite: 5734]
<<Ne xehetsie nepitanuani xemikahiweritiarienikiri, [cite: 5735] miixari kexemite'anuyehu xetewiyatsitiarieti. [cite: 5736, 5737, 5738, 5739]

Miki tukaritsie ne nekaniwaranukuweiyamiki kemi'ane wairiyarika memitexe'aitia, [cite: 5740] nepiwatawikweitsitiani muxatsi memi'ikamimiri, [cite: 5741] meta nekaniwaranukuwaumiki memeuyexiri. [cite: 5743, 5744] Xeme xemariwame waikawa nepixe'ayeitiani [cite: 5745] 'iya nuiwarite watsata hakewa tewiniarie. [cite: 5746, 5747]

Miki tukaritsie ne nekanixe'atiamiki, [cite: 5748] miki tukaritsie nepixekuxeirieni. [cite: 5749] Xeme xemariwame waikawa nepixe'ayeitiani [cite: 5750] yunaime teiteri kwiepa memitama watsata [cite: 5751] kepauka nemixehakunuitiani miki wahixie 'ateewa xehehapanieku». [cite: 5752] Mipai kaniutayini Yawé. [cite: 5753]
